snippet: Six people were killed at a campsite and a suspect was arrested and charged in the weekend homicides, the authorities said Monday.
abstract: Texas authorities announce arrest of William Hudson in connection with homicides of six people at Dallas campsite.
lead_paragraph: Six people were killed at a campsite and a suspect was arrested and charged in the weekend homicides, the authorities said Monday.

headline.main: Texas: Suspect Held After 6 Campers Are Found Dead
headline.print_headline: Texas: Suspect Held After 6 Campers Are Found Dead
